column2: What is the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?

column2: What is the difference between bagging and boosting?

column4: while boosting sequentially trains models
column5: each correcting the errors of the previous one.

column2: What is the difference between a parametric and non-parametric model?

column2: What is the purpose of a learning rate in gradient descent?

column2: What is the difference between an epoch and an iteration?
